channel.title: I'm not quite getting this game
channel.description: I'm new to moparscape, I have logged in but i got a few questions where is everybody is it only me playing this game? and also how do i do armor and weps etc? help appreciated

item.title: I'm not quite getting this game
item.dc:creator: @death_t_d death t d
item.description:
@death_t_d wrote:

The main page is a webclient that connects to localhost. You wont see anyone online. MoparScape is not a private server, its rather a private server community that discusses about private servers and coding ect…

Read full topic
item.source: I'm not quite getting this game
